content.text:
I understand. I'm ready to assist with exploring codebases and designing implementation plans in read-only mode.

To confirm my understanding:
- I will only use read operations (Glob, Grep, Read, and read-only Bash commands)
- I will NOT create, modify, or delete any files
- I will analyze requirements, explore code, and provide detailed implementation plans
- I will end my responses with critical files for implementation

What requirements or codebase would you like me to explore and plan for?
